executive_summary: Today's AI news from OpenAI highlights new product developments, including an AI Website Builder and updates to their o3, o4-mini, and GPT-4.1 models for faster code shipping. There are also announcements about new regional presences in Germany and UAE, and leadership changes with the addition of Fidji Simo.

stories.title: Creating websites in minutes with AI Website Builder
stories.summary: OpenAI introduces an AI Website Builder, enabling users to create websites rapidly, streamlining the web development process.

stories.title: Addendum to OpenAI o3 and o4-mini system card: OpenAI o3 Operator
stories.summary: OpenAI released an addendum to their o3 and o4-mini system cards, providing further details on the o3 Operator.

stories.title: OpenAI Deutschland
stories.summary: OpenAI announced its expansion into Germany, establishing a new presence in the country.

stories.title: Shipping code faster with o3, o4-mini, and GPT-4.1
stories.summary: OpenAI highlights how their o3, o4-mini, and GPT-4.1 models can accelerate code shipping for developers.

stories.title: Introducing Stargate UAE
stories.summary: OpenAI announced the introduction of 'Stargate UAE', indicating a new initiative or presence in the United Arab Emirates.

stories.title: New tools and features in the Responses API
stories.summary: OpenAI rolled out new tools and features for its Responses API, enhancing its capabilities for developers.

stories.title: Sam & Jony introduce io
stories.summary: Sam Altman and Jony Ive introduced 'io', hinting at a new product or project collaboration.

stories.title: Addendum to o3 and o4-mini system card: Codex
stories.summary: OpenAI released an addendum to the o3 and o4-mini system cards, specifically detailing aspects related to Codex.

stories.title: Introducing Codex
stories.summary: OpenAI officially introduced Codex, an AI model designed to translate natural language into code.

stories.title: AI powers Expediaâ€™s marketing evolution
stories.summary: OpenAI highlights how its AI technology is being leveraged by Expedia to evolve its marketing strategies.

stories.title: Introducing HealthBench
stories.summary: OpenAI unveiled HealthBench, a new benchmark or initiative focused on AI applications in the healthcare sector.

stories.title: OpenAI Expands Leadership with Fidji Simo
stories.summary: OpenAI announced the expansion of its leadership team with the addition of Fidji Simo.
